Name: zho-anonymousgroupo-lad
Author: Anonymous Group Of Translators
Source: Goodword Books , http://www.goodwordbooks.com/ , Center for Peace and Spirituality , https://www.cpsglobal.org/

Translations.Text: Nándào wǒ méiyǒu wéi nǐ ér kāità nǐ de xiōngjīn ma
Wǒ xiè xiàle nǐ de zhòngrèn
jíshǐ nǐ de bèi dānfùguò zhòng de
yǔ jiān nàn xiāngbàn de, què shì róngyì
yǔ jiān nàn xiāngbàn de, què shì róngyì
dāng nǐ de shìwù wánbì shí
nǐ yīngdāng qínláo, nǐ yīngdāng xiàng nǐ de zhǔ kěnqiú
